scripts.clean: npm run clean -w forgeframe && npm run clean -w @forgeframe/playground
scripts.release: npm run build -w forgeframe && npm publish -w forgeframe
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -w forgeframe && npm run release && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -w forgeframe && npm run release && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -w forgeframe && npm run release && git push && git push --tags
